Package io.atlasmap.service.lsp

Class AtlasExpressionLSPService

java.lang.Object
javax.websocket.Endpoint
org.eclipse.lsp4j.websocket.WebSocketEndpoint<org.eclipse.lsp4j.services.LanguageClient>
io.atlasmap.service.lsp.AtlasExpressionLSPService
public class AtlasExpressionLSPService extends org.eclipse.lsp4j.websocket.WebSocketEndpoint<org.eclipse.lsp4j.services.LanguageClient>
The AtlasMap Expression LSP Service provides Language Server functionality for the AtlasMap conditional mapping expression language. See https://microsoft.github.io/language-server-protocol/ It uses LSP4J to implement the LSP communication layer. See https://projects.eclipse.org/projects/technology.lsp4j This class is an implementation of the Endpoint which plugs in to the LSP4J websocket binding.
See Also:
  • AtlasExpressionLanguageServer
  • AtlasExpressionTextDocumentService
  • AtlasExpressionWorkspaceService
